Give back to the community? Take over the world? (then what?) Live a luxurious lifestyle? Sponsor your friends and family? Seek out art? Create new ventures / organizations? (What kind?)

column2: Another INFP girl asking for advice with an ENFJ :)
column3:
I'll try to keep this short

I did this small group project with an ENFJ in my class, and we kinda clicked. Well not kinda. It was like....i was living peacefully and quietly in my introverted bubble, writing poems, painting, baking cookies and daydreaming and just.... being alone in peace. I have a reputation of a quiet girl in our school. Then this ENFJ just pops out of nowhere and smashes everything with his hammer of pats on the shoulder, smiles, LOTS of eye contact, praises, jokes, supportive smile and awesomeness. At first I was really shocked, but now i just stare at him with awe. He really is pure awesomeness, brave, charismatic, friendly, supportive, caring.... i could cry just thinking about how great he is :butterfly:

We didn't really have any serious conversation, it all happened so fast and i was shy. I'm just a shy person, i can't help it! I mean, if you're gonna blow my mind and crash my world, at least give me one week advance warning. After the group project, he kinda kept watching me and trying to take eye contact with me, and i kept being shy. Now he has backed off, he no longer tries to talk with me or touch me. He still takes eye contact and mysteriously appears to places i go, like once during a break i was chilling with my best friend and he walked by us 26 times. literally 26 times. I mean, could be a coincidence, but still... and since he stopped talking to me, I've had withdrawal symptoms. I miss him around. 

I thought that this is a guy i really wanna get to know, so last time we saw each other, i smiled at him. He smiled back and then looked down. Why? 

I wish i could talk with him. I wish I could sit with him during lunch, or at least near him, and just watch him smile and laugh and make everyone feel valued. I love that about him, he has this awesome talent to make everyone feel valued and accepted. But I also wish I could get to know him, I wish i could show him my old treehouse and really talk with him in there. I wanna know what is his favourite cake so i can bake that to him when it's his birthday.  I wanna know his favourite movie so we can watch it together if he catches a cold. I wanna know what makes him sad, so i can hug him and tell him everything's gonna be ok. I wanna know what makes him hurt so i can kiss him till the pain goes away. And i just wanna be there, where ever he is, and watch him being the awesome person that he is. 

sigh.... head in the clouds, but I don't care. 

I've read that ENFJs like chatty people, maybe he doesn't like me since i'm so shy? I really wanna talk with him, but I don't know what to do. Write a love letter? That would be weird... Right now I just stare at him and look away when he catches me doing that, and I hope that he figures out my feelings for him  At the same time I feel he might like me too, but since he's an ENFJ, I don't know... He's nice to everyone. I did feel like I was special to him, but then he backed off.... Was it because I was so shy? I didn't mean to hurt him  

You who read this till the end are a super hero  here's a cute hamster :hampster:

column2: How to get my ENFJ to make an effort?
column3:
So I matched with really gorgrous ENFJ on tinder lol....anyway we been texting for about a month now and he still has been too "busy" to make time to meet up with me. Ive never dealth with an ENFJ before so would like some advise? Im an ENTJ btw so giving me definitive responses and schedules are important, and it drives me insane when I have to wait for any confirmation.

This is how it all went down. 

At first his responses were short and shallow. I would start conversations where his response was one word and he wouldnt follow up questions or comments which can make the conversation keep going. However he always responded within 30 mins. Thats why I kept being patient because when someone I didn't want to talk to messaged me I would rarely ever respond. The only time he would put more effort into the was after midnight. At first I thought its because he was horny and wanting to sext. Later he told me its because he finishes work around that time so his replies were not so abrupt. The conversations at that time however, would always somehow lead up to something sexual.....That bothered me.

So eventually after I asked, he agreed to meet up with me on his day off (Tuesday). Tuesday morning this is how the conversation went:

Me: Hey still good for today?
Him: Yeah I am looking forward to it! I'm going to the dojo be back in 2 hours
Me: Ok have fun

(2 hours later....)
Him: I fucked up....
Me: ok?
Him: I twisted my knee doing spin sorry we gotta post pone. But I heal fast

So this was super coincidental to me and I had a suspicion it was a last minute ditch because he either got cold feet or was unsure or whatever reason. We continue talking for the next few days until I got annoyed at his wishy washyness and went offff at him. 

Me: Look I'm pretty much done with this. You don't put in any effort. When you cancel a plan at least arrange another date to meet up. It feels like you don't even want to see me.
Him: I do, I really like you. If you can't see that then its on you.
Me: Yeah again, if someone wants to see someone the I'm busy excuse is a load of crap. There's 24 hours in a day, its not that hard to set aside one hour to have coffee. Im so over this
Him: So you're leaving me? (i literally rolled my eyes when he said that because it just seemed manipulative)
Me: I want you to at least admit you had no intentions of meeting me and didn't want to put any effort. Then this can be over and done with. I told you i been used and treated like a piece of meat in the past and its upsetting that you are doing it to me too. The least you can do is to be honest with me
Him: ok youre right I didn't make any effort and I was leading you on. I don't know why I did it. I really don't. Im really sorry. I wish I could tell you why I did it but I can't.
Me: thanks that's all I wanted to hear.
Him: but its true I really do like you. Listen I finish work at 9pm tonight can I give you a call? We could talk over the phone then decide what we both want to do?

So he calls me, we chat for hours while he was babysitting his cousin. Then when his uncle came home he got off the phone, drove him and proceeded to call me again at his own initiative. So I was happy about that. He said he felt alot more relaxed and really wanted to meet me after the long call. He also explained he works alot because his dad doesn't have a job at the moment and his mum has been sick for a year so only he and his brother works. He also said he would try to to see me this week:

Me: Soooo hows this week looking?
Him: My boss arrives at 4pm ill ask her to give me a day off then
(after 4pm)
Me: ????
Him: This week im the only one on shift who has a liscense and she can't give me any day off. 15 hour shift and sat is my mum's birthday.
Me: Oh all good i understand
Him: I will ask my boss on Thurs about next week k?
Me: What if she says no
Him: Then we will plan around it.

Anyways i kinda have this ominous feeling there will be more excuses again. I really don't get his behavior. Maybe I am not giving him a wow factor to want to be anxious to see me? How do I get him excited to me? What do you ENFJs like talking about that keeps you captivated by someone? 

And no, don't tell me to give up on him. I'm not ready to yet. Not until Ive exhausted all options, which at this point I feel I had not yet. Also do ENFJs like ppl chasing them or does it make them less inclined to be interested? I really am clueless when dealing with ENFJs. The thing is he always responds to me very quickly and all the time. Which I view as a good sign. And he has warmed up to me more and more but I have yet to get a definitive response as to when he will lock in a solid plan to meet up.

Seriously...in the last two weeks, I've seen at least 4 new ENFJ's around, and all of them are females. What the heck happened to male ENFJ's? Are we rarer than dust in the wind? I see so many male INFJ's, but I think there's only...4 other ENFJ males to my knowledge (jdmn, Kali, Lightleggy, and I swear I'm missing one)...where are all the male ENFJ's? Did the ISTP's burn us like witches for being sensitive men? What happened?

Sorry...un-serious post/ramble/rant...I do that on occasion.

P.S. Male ENFJ's, represent, I feel so alone.

column2: To Be or Not to be that is the question!
column3: Can anyone tell me, is it unhealthy for an ENFJ to be a loner, especially if they've been in a long term relationship and they've felt being used, or they've lost they're sense of identity.If we really are the givers, then as a male, isn't that seen as weakness by women to be exploited. Can that neediness to serve and make someone else happy and forego your own needs be un masculine. Would appreciate some views.

column2: Hoping to Gain Insight from other ENFJs on my predicament
column3:
Bit Long but looking from help from ENFJs

Hey everyone, never thought I would actually make a post. I have a predicament that I am currently encountering and would love to gain insight on what may have happened and what I should do moving forward.

I'm:    [INFP]
She's: [ENFJ]

So a few weeks ago I met this wonderful women on a dating site. I initiated the conversation after viewing her profile because there was just some special charm to the profile unlike others I've seen. It radiated warmth, was about her daily lives, and well I just wanted to get to know the person. At the same time though she lives on the other side of the state and knowing this I was a little hesitant that and well I always thought I would prefer someone of similar ethnic background as me. She messaged back and well this was 4 AM in the morning for me and 7 AM her time. She works night shift as a nurse and was trying to head to sleep but apparently the storm that was going on kept her awake. I tried to comfort her and somehow it ended up as her comforting me. Don't remember how that happened but I told her she's just so nice and bubbly and I wished I had a friend like that in my life. We then proceed to add each other on WeChat (a messaging app).

The next day she went and messaged me first in the morning, and I remember messaging back, but at the same time knowing that she lives far away among other concerns I believe I said I'll be right back as I was going to eat lunch. After lunch ended I don't remember who messaged first but we started talking again. And we talked for a couple of hours though the app. Then she asked me if she could call me. Just to check if I was a real person. So I agreed to just a voice chat and I'm so glad I did. She was just the warmest individual, great personality. We talked for 3 hours about our values and what we shared such as not drinking, smoking, looking for that one true love. after messaging back and forth again we talked again for an additional 5 hours that same day. I've never talked with anyone for more than 2 hours. The next day I talked to her again this time through video chat. We were both nervous, but after I saw her I thought she was just the most gorgeous thing ever. She's got a heart of gold, telling me how she doesn't care for a guys background, his wealth, and looks only at personality and looks. She said she thought I was cute, and kept saying that I was unlike other guys which I still don't agree with. What I did think though was that I never thought there was someone so perfect in this world. We shared a lot, and even though it was a just a couple of days we never felt like there was anyone in this world that we felt so close with. We shared each others images back and forth and well one day I told her I wanted to get back on the dating app just to save those images. She said no its ok I'll send u them and she sent me 40 or so images and explained each one (186 messages on my phone when I woke up). She proceeded to uninstall the app and deactivate the it as well. I went and did the same. ENFJ are so good at building trust and authenticity and to be able to get someone like me to trust that easily is tough. There was one problem though. She lived 1000's of miles away from me. When I told her she said that she will fly over. Which surprised me greatly. I told her if I was a friend I would tell her thats crazy but it made me really happy. She went and bought a ticket and showed it to me. I went ahead and booked an airbnb for her near where I lived. She said she wanted to meet me as a friend. We were both adamant on taking things slowly because we thought rushing into things would be bad. Everyday leading up to the day she flies over we would video chat even while she worked.

Then came a few days prior to the day of the flight. Everything was fine the day before. We were watching an anime show together. However today when I messaged her she didn't reply. Then when I called her she said she was running late. I got worried that maybe I might've did something wrong. Did I come on to strong I thought. I messaged her apologizing saying that I do not know what I did wrong. Then thats when everything came out. She apologized to me saying that she was already married, and actually in the middle of going through a divorce. She proceeded to show me documents she has filled out in march and filed just recently a month ago. I was really devastated, I told her why she would do this to me and lie to me. She said no she didn't mean to and she didn't lie, which in truth she didn't. I knew she had a tough past being dumped by her own mother at 18 and left to work multiple jobs to get on in life. That past didn't matter to me. I saw her as a strong individual. When she told me she was married though and going through divorce that was just a big shock. I overreacted quite a bit. She said that she was sorry, and that she was going through a tough time and that she would have to cancel the flight. I thought I was being pranked, but she asked to wire money with Chase to pay me back for the airbnb so at the same time I also thought it can't be? I have her on facebook, instagram, as well as know about her closest friends and their social media as well. She said everything that we shared was genuine, but that she just wanted to move on with her past right and just won't have room for love. She was in an arranged marriage for 5 years and the spouse wanted to have another wife, apparently this is ok in Saudi Arabia or something. So she wanted out. I told her I understand but too much was happening to me to really comprehend the situation. She again stated lets be friends and that maybe in the future if she finally moves on we can be closer than friends but for now she just wants time alone. She told me to not wait for her as and find someone else as she doesn't want to put me through that. Btw she's really romantic as a person, watching Korean, and Chinese dramas and knows all the lines and have used a few on me and always dreams of someone to just take her away. (her words).

Anyways I don't know how much of this is true, whether to pursue or not and how much time to give before messaging her again as she said she needs time to move on with her past. I'm assuming talking to me brings pain? or maybe this was all one huge prank.... and I'm just a dumb idiot :/ I'm definitely hoping that its not the latter cause I really do love her for who she is even with the situation she has. I too am a crazy romantic, and have thought about flying to her (but that sounds wrong on so many levels and maybe even illegal. ex: its a prank and I show up at her work place just to be put in handcuffs or have a restraining order put on me)

column2: Not being able let go of a friendship
column3:
Hi there,

First time I post something here, even though I have read a lot of threads here.

I have something bothering me, and I would hope to receive some tips of how to develop and get through it.
I really have a tendency to get "fixated" over relationships several times. Like, I can't let go of a certain person and our relationship. Some of these times, I have kind of become scared as well, since I thought that I had developed feelings for the other person. However, I have come to recognize that I just obsess over our relationship very much. When I really want the friendship to work out, I get really devoted and want to do everything in my power to make it work. I think of every aspect and every possible scenario of how our friendship will develop. Still, there have been several times that these friendships have not worked out. Those are worst, since I kind of breaks me down thinking that I couldn't befriend that person, even though I did everything that I could. I can think about it for days and weeks without being able to let it go, until one day (maybe months later) when I finally just stop thinking about it. 

I sometimes think about if it has something to do with me wanting to help people, and get them to open up and feeling free and comfortable, (which I personally think that I usually help people with). 

Are there anyone else out there feeling the same way, and maybe someone that can hand me a tip about how to develop that treat?

I find Fe hard to understand because someone using Fe can make everyone feel welcome, cared for and understood. I usually chose to open up only to people I really trust and witb others I share little. I observed my bf ENFJ can talk about everything with everybody, depending on that person's disponibility to listen. I don't get this at all, how it's possible to talk with some people as they are very important in your life and wanting to stay in touch with them, daily/weekly, even though it's exhausting. I try to understand this.

column2: Why do i seem attracting and attracted to ENFJ
column3:
Today after 20 years. I have conversation with my ex and find out that he is ENFJ. He pursue me for five years back then in high school and college. And still cannot forget me and say he never find anyone like me. 
My latest attraction to a guy is also an ENFJ.

Trying to understand this..

Hello all. I?ôm new here.

I feel like I?ôm more introverted the older I get. I watch more, listen more, weigh everything I say more. I was also an only child so I love alone time and spend much of my time reading or doing hobbies. However, I feel odd that I?ôm an extrovert that often feels more introverted at times.

I?ôm a female in a male dominated field. I do a lot of public speaking. I connect especially well when addressing groups - I am then in my element, though I don?ôt necessarily like the lime light.

Maybe I?ôm becoming more introverted, because I have such a low opinion of myself and my abilities. There are enormous barriers in my field due to my gender. This makes me more self conscious and frustrated. However, at the same time I constantly cover up my abilities because I know how I?ôm perceived at times. So I feel incompetent even though I hide my abilities. However, I also feel bad because people get compared to me and they just don?ôt have my gifting then I feel like I need to dumb myself down more. 

I also feel like a complete jerk much of the time. I sometimes think I?ôm an ENTJ trapped in an ENFJ body. Some days I would just love to tell people that they are lazy bums or complete narrow minded jerks. However I, smile and connect because I also see good in even bums and jerks. ??????

After looking more into the natural weaknesses of my type, I've noticed that one of our biggest problems is manipulation.

I may just be naive, but I've never really understood what this means. To me, that's a red flag, because I could just be unaware of it in myself and be hurting people without realizing it.

Basically, I just want to know personal experiences with this problem, and what it looks like in practice.

And if you've never noticed this problem before, what are other pro's/con's of ENFJs?

Hi there,

This is my ongoing questionnaire comparing MBTI to Enneagram Tritypes. This is a test poll as I will start the exact same post on each MBTI type sub-forums hoping to determine which Tritypes are more prevalent in certain MBTI types and which ones are less common. Any comments and thoughts on any posts are welcomed en encouraged. Thank you for your votes in advance.

Edit : I couldn't write all the Tritypes because of the 20 choices poll limit. Also, if you're still unsure of your Tritype but quite certain anyways, please vote the one that fits best.

Edit 2 : The numbers' order in your Tritype doesn't matter for the vote. So even if you don't see 271 in the choices, for example, please click on the standardized order (EG, 127).

column2: ENFJ Care and Handling User Guide and Manual
column3:
Hello, fellow sweetheart ENFJs! ??I just came across a Care Manual for ISFPs and loved it so much, I started looking for other "instructions" to different types, and thought you might like to see it too! My apologies in advance if this has already been posted;; Post by foreveranevilregal@Tumblr. Original concept by intpboard@Tumblr.

ENFJ Care and Handling User Guide and Manual?ãCongratulations! You have been chosen by an ENFJ to be an important person in their life. Your ENFJ comes in color coordinated and aesthetically pleasing packaging perfectly suited to both your and their needs. Although your ENFJ does not need to be cared for in the traditional sense, here are a few tips to ensure the most harmonious interactions with your newfound extroverted idealist.

Your ENFJ comes with:

Ten (10) color coordinated outfits
Twelve (12) small fluffy animals of your ENFJ?ôs preference
One (1) large box tea assortment
One (1) soapbox for speech-making purposes
One (1) electronic device for constant communication with others
One (1) newspaper subscription (most likely electronic) for staying up-to-date on current events and world affairs
Two (2) bookshelves filled with various types of literature
One (1) etiquette manual. Your ENFJ has never read it, nor have they ever felt the need to, but it has been included for your benefit.
One (1) burning life purpose that will Make the World a Better Place.
Custom upgrades: Your ENFJ will have some sort of creative hobby. Musical instruments, microphones, art implements, writing implements, and/or athletic equipment may also be included.


Software
Your ENFJ comes preprogrammed with the following traits;

Fe: Your ENFJ has an innate sense of how interpersonal affairs function and how one should navigate them. Keenly concerned with the state of others, both loved ones and humanity as a whole, your ENFJ strives to do what is best for others and maintain peace in their relationships. Your ENFJ will motivate, encourage, compliment, support, and comfort other people. Open communication is very important to your ENFJ, and trust is paramount.

Ni: Not only does your ENFJ care immensely about others, but they know exactly how to improve their lives. ENFJ units come with a preinstalled ?úlife purpose??program that presses upon them a deep burden to improve the state of the world in some way that is uniquely suited to their individual talents and abilities. Usually, this improvement can be directly connected to other people in some way. Do not try to argue the life purpose with your ENFJ. They have reflected upon it deeply and are certain that this is in fact what they want to do with their lives.

Se: Your ENFJ is aware of the world around them and its various sensory details. They are action-oriented and will take initiative to implement their plans for a better future. Generally, they will have good reflexes and appreciate pleasant and organizes surroundings. Decent at multitasking. Sometimes they will take too much upon themselves, which can lead to burnout.

Ti: This function acts as a filter for Fe and ensures that your ENFJ?ôs words and actions are logically consistent, accurate, and appropriate. Depending on the particular ENFJ that has chosen you, the Ti filter may function properly to balance Fe, or it may malfunction and either be overly manifested in critical attitudes or be entirely absent and lead to irrational behavior.


Getting Started

Activate electronic device and place in your ENFJ?ôs hand.
Make your ENFJ a cup of tea (preferably herbal).
Wait for the electronic device to register attempted communication from others.
Allow your ENFJ to drink tea and communicate with others until fully charged.
If step 4 does not work, initiate a form of physical contact, such as hugging or cuddling, with your ENFJ.
If for some reason your ENFJ is averse to physical contact, repeat step 4 but with the small fluffy animals arranged around them.

Modes
Friend Mode (default): Your ENFJ will want to befriend everyone they encounter. They will ask thoughtful and personalized questions to get to know the other person and want to establish a positive relationship with them.

Mom Mode (default): Your ENFJ is very concerned about others and whether or not they are taking care of themselves. Can often be found inquiring whether others have eaten, hydrated, slept enough, finished that thing they were procrastinating, are wearing weather appropriate clothing, have taken relevant medications, etc. Your ENFJ will do this regardless of whether the other person is younger or old enough to be their own mother.

Teacher Mode (default): Your ENFJ enjoys learning about the world, and sharing that knowledge even more so. They can often be found recounting an interesting article they read the other day or a cool discovery in a field that they like. Can be triggered by the phrase ?úI don?ôt understand?¶‚Ä? Your ENFJ will explain things in a way that you will understand. ENFJs are also prone to turning a difficult situation into a Teaching Moment.

Counselor Mode: Activated when someone is going through a difficult situation. Self-taught psychologists, ENFJ units innately understand how people work and will generally know how to be more helpful. Your ENFJ will validate and affirm the hurting individual and usually leave them feeling better. Warning: your ENFJ may give advice more than is necessary if relying too heavily on Fe and not enough on Ni.

Superhero Mode: Activated under stress. ENFJs have a habit of taking on more than they can carry, and it eventually takes a toll. Your ENFJ will insist that they are fine. Their eyes will glaze over and twitch if you question them about their activities. Asking them how they plan to sustain this schedule will probably induce tears. Beware. Your ENFJ has entered full delusion.

Pseudo-Introvert Mode: Activated under severe stress. Your ENFJ has become so overwhelmed that they are shutting down. Characterized by refusal to socialize, a marked reduction in activities, and unusual silence in their presence. Symptoms also include grumpiness, calmness, an insistence that they are ?újust tired??or that ?úit?ôs been a long week?? and increased need for sleep. Seek help for your ENFJ if they start to claim that they don?ôt need others.

Manipulative Dictator Mode: If your ENFJ gains pleasure from controlling others or getting them to do things according to their will which others may not have chosen on their own, they are unhealthy. Perform a diagnostic check to ensure that all functions are in working order. Detoxification of Fe or Ni may be necessary.


Relationships With Other Units
NF: The easiest for your ENFJ to communicate with due to their naturally flowing and symbol-laden speech. Your ENFJ will appreciate their idealism and encourage them to follow their dreams.

NT: Slightly more challenging due to the strict rationalism present in NTs, but can get along on a conceptual basis if their ideas are complementary. Your ENFJ secretly admires NTs but knows that they can never admit it to one.

SJ: Can be somewhat difficult to communicate with due to the concrete and direct style these types employ, but your ENFJ will love them all the same and appreciate their loyalty.

SP: Your ENFJ will be fascinated by SPs and how they can do things so easily, and will want to hang out with them all the time. Do not let the SPs talk your ENFJ into skydiving. They?ôll claim they can handle it until they start screaming halfway out of the plane.


Feeding
Your ENFJ will claim that they have transcended basic human needs such as food. Your ENFJ is a liar who will get very cranky if they forget to eat. A glazed over expression, extended silence, or general withdrawnness can often be attributed to hunger. Feed regularly. Chocolate non-optional.

Grooming
ENFJs are generally fastidious about personal hygiene and have established a personal style of clothing/accessories/makeup. May occasionally leave the house without an accessory or mismatched shoes. If they are busy, help them by organizing the outfit they have chosen and ensuring that every component is there.

Sleeping
Your ENFJ will eschew sleep, as it limits time that could be spent socializing and doing things. Remind your ENFJ what happened the last time they slept less than 6 hours and that sleeping now will help them function better tomorrow.


Frequently Asked Questions
Is my ENFJ really that excited?

Generally, yes. ENFJs look for the bright side in every situation, and tend to genuinely enjoy the things they claim to enjoy. Lack of affinity for something will be signaled by a neutral yet diplomatic statement.

Does my ENFJ actually like me if they claim to love everyone?

You bet. ENFJs are very particular about being authentic in their remarks, and will tend to give praise specifically tailored to an individual. They will not tell you you?ôre a great athlete if you?ôre not. That being said, ENFJs look for the good in everyone and usually manage to find it. So yes, they do love everyone.

But if my ENFJ lives to care for others, they surely must not need care?

That?ôs where you?ôre wrong. Although ENFJs derive the most pleasure from caring for others, they need affirmation and appreciation to keep going and feel like their efforts aren?ôt in vain. Be sure to regularly tell your ENFJ how much you appreciate what they do for you. You might find yourself with a pleasant surprise if you do.

My ENFJ isn?ôt being very nice.

ENFJs are emotional, caring beings. They are not always nice. They try to be, but sometimes they snap. It?ôs only because they?ôve been trying to keep it inside. Encourage your ENFJ to talk about negative feelings openly (this may take some persuasion, as ENFJs like to ignore negative feelings and pretend they don?ôt exist) to prevent such an explosion.

Again, congratulations on your new ENFJ unit! Have fun!??,https://www.personalitycafe.com//threads/enfj-care-and-handling-user-guide-and-manual.1286643/

column2: My ENFJ died... I can't... Get over it.
column3:
My ENFJ love, passed away..... I feel like I've been hit over the head with a mack truck 


He had the most beautiful, deep, dark eyes and sweet smile; I loved resting my hands on his shoulders.... And kissing him when he wasn't expecting it.

But as he gave me back-hugs, when I had bad days, and kept saying, "I'm here," "It's okay," - that was truly the most magical thing!


He totally got me: best listener (ever), very, very sassy but also a sensitive... Talented singer... Creative and kind-hearted. Good sense of humor...

I idolized and respected him for 10 years. He was everything I wanted to be. He had this aura about them... Such a beautiful, airy, innocent energy. I used to think "Geez he is going to go to heaven, God is just so obviously favoring him..." idk

This ENFJ had an extremely hard life, his dad treated him like shit and he worked so much, at a young age that... I feel he lost himself... He was 27 when he died, but reminded me of a 15-year-old half the time. Most people just blend in and fit in with others, but my ENFJ, he never truly fitted in and you just felt it and so did he. 

But dealing with enough pain for 5 people didn't lead him to result to bad behavior. All our friends had the same thing to say about him: "he is very hospitable."

He wasn't perfect; he could be grumpy and really dramatic and too much of a people pleaser. Sometimes he would be depressed but had a indefinite answer about the "why". This made him have no sense of time and a bit of a handful to deal with at times. So I'd put in massive efforts to see to it that, he, instead of others, REALLY got his way. What can I say, seeing him proud and happy was better than eating chocolate cake.

I can go on... BUT he is gone. Badly I wanted to join him! But he came in my dreams and told me, "I'm not leaving you". 

Rubbing my hands down his sharp jawline, I recall and still feel him. Is this what they call a "twin flame" or whatever the hell that means, my beloved ENFJ-t. 

I almost flung myself off a building after he died. And I'm an optimistic, cheerful person - I just couldn't deal with the grief because I knew--I just knew, how can I replace him? I can't replace this ENFJ.

INFP's are terrible at "getting over" something. Am I too romantic and pathetic? 

We loved each other equally.

Sorry for my crappy grammar, I was using my phone. I just wanted to let you guys know how much I love you and all that.

Also, I am not a bias person but this ENFJ man was seriously the sexiest person alive. :blushed: I love ENFJs

column2: ENFJs unsure of the soundness of their own logic
column3:
What do you think of the following statement?

Since ENFJs are ultimately unsure of the soundness of their own logic (Ti), they may unwittingly try to convince themselves through the act of convincing others. The more people they can convince that an idea is sound (Fe), the more confident they hope to feel about its veracity (Ti)]  https://personalityjunkie.com/enfj-type-profile/

Have you done this? Still doing it?
Are you unsure of the correctness of your own logic?
Does it bother you a lot?

And a scenario: have you ever learned something through study / Ti activity (like discovering something in a documentary), that happened to be a minority opinion / belief that you could not get approved by your family/friends. And what did you do? Did you stick to your newfound belief or did you forget about it?

Please answer one or more questions or just say something else about it.

column2: A turbulent ENFJ that started to become ENTJ - story by INFP friend
column3:
Just thought I'd share this as I thought it was interesting. 

One of my best friends is a turbulent ENFJ and while spending a lot of time around thinking types in part of his course, he started to get ENTJ when he took the MBTI. Now as his INFP friend who had known him for a while my Fi was screaming definitely not ENTJ but to my amusement he told me all about how he was becoming more and more comfortable with the ENTJ profile as a depiction of himself. This guy is literally one of the most loving, kind, fun-centered people so it was kind of hilarious to hear him convincing himself he was a cold hearted commander, but I've also learnt to value his harmony so encouraged him to do whatever feels natural while suppressing the Fi. Anyway move on a year and he has come to his senses, but told me about how he felt himself connecting on a deep level during that period of his life with Voldemort, a classic ENTJ. He was going down a dark path :laughing::laughing:

Have any of you guys gone back and forth between types?

column2: ENFJ's...do you prefer to date INFP or INTP's??
column3:
I've been seeing an ENFJ for a couple months and we had just gone through a roller coaster ride and it's not always at it's best.  I believed he is seeing an INTP girl on the side and it's barely new.  The reason I am asking is because he flat out broke up with me and said that we have compatibility issues.  I get I'm an Infp and consistently need my space and he is EXTREMELY NEEDY.  Connection wise it is great when we are not arguing...but sometimes he overwhelms me.  

Since I am curious the connection between the INTP will be... since his new girl hits that profile.

I'm just asking because I'm curious

What are your past experiences like?

Did you sometimes find that your opinions were quite similar, but your reasoning different? 

Would you ever frustrate each other? Why?

So I thought we should have our own poetry thread. Please do post your poems. Here's one I wrote yesterday:

My Parents

My Father

He never said much growing up,
Not like now,
He goes on and on and repeats himself like a cuckoo clock,
Though no one can say he isn?ôt supremely thorough in everything he does,
But I digress,
I don?ôt remember anything he ever said to me as a child,
Except-,
All bad of course,
My father,
Who houses me from not too far away,
Pays for my car??
I guess it?ôs his way of showing his love,
In any case I?ôll take it,
Since on my own I am homeless and broke,
Now I drive, and sleep easy,
For my father,
Who never not worked a day,
In his life,
Even though now he?ôs retired,
He?ôs not perfect,
He?ôs done things I?ôve had to find in myself to forgive,
But??
He loves me,
And a lot of love is not something I have,
So I take what I get,
And know how I am blessed,
With the father I?ôve got,
Whom I?ôve grown to love.

My Mother

My mother has a touch of Obsessive Compulsive Disorder,
She cleans like she's on crack and stockpiles cleaning supplies like a doomsday bunker full of food,
It manifests too in other ways,
Like in how maniacly she plays, doing her thing,
Like marathon Mahjongg games and intense stretches of gardening,
My mother is sweet like candy I am so blessed,
To have a mother like her,
Even though she sometimes talks about people in a way they might hear,
Like when they are right there, way too near for what she is saying,
She?ôs smart though in general,
Was top of her nursing class, even with a language barrier,
And she gives good advice,
I always regret when I didn?ôt listen,
Except for when she told me to marry a rich man,
Instead I divorced a poor man and married a dog,
That's what I think of my new boyfriend at least,
My big doggy, he?ôs a little more useful but not by a lot,
My mother is scared of his tattoos, they are grotesque,
Because of them she doesn?ôt invite him over much,
She?ôs funny like that,
But still, she occasionally makes him some food,
Ah yes, my mother,
Who took me fishing once where I caught a goldfish,
She always had a delicious meal ready,
And a girls??day shopping trip planned,
Yes, to me she?ôs rich,
Not filthy rich but well off,
Except in love the flow is steady,
If I could say one thing to her, this I?ôd say,
You?ôve taught me well, you?ôve always shown me the way,
For this how could I ever thank you or repay,
But know this, as we age, I will try.

column2: Calling all Whovians! RE: Matt Smith
column3:
I'm interested to know what y'all think Matt Smith's type might be. I am pretty convinced that he's an ENFJ, from reading biography stuff, watching interviews, etc. 

I think I've read somewhere that he plays 11 as an ENTP, which I can see for sure. That's all good and dandy, but I am really more interested in seeing what people think his actual personality type is. 

And if you have any other insights into the MBTIs of past Doctors, actors who played them, or supporting characters, go ahead and add them as well!

I await your answers!

column2: Met an Amazing Guy While Traveling Abroad
column3:
I went on a backpacking trip for two months this summer across Europe. Before I went I did a tarot card reading that said something to the effect of "you'll meet the love of your life while traveling across water." Interesting side note if you are into that kind of thing 

I'm 29 and my type is INFJ by the way.

Okay so the very last city I visited is Amsterdam. I wanted to see the Netherlands, but was also sketched out by the idea of Amsterdam. I'm admittedly a very good girl -- I don't drink, smoke, do drugs, party. So I was not at all into the pot and prostitution scene that many people go to Amsterdam for. When booking my trip, I found a Christian hostel in the city and was like "Score!" It was right up my alley. The whole place is covered in Jesus artwork, there's Bible readings, you get the idea. And it's all Christian volunteers who run the place. 

First night there I get checked into the hostel by a supppeerrrr cute guy. He asked me where I was from (the United States). He went to college in the United States so we spent time talking about that, his time in college. We talked about my trip so far. I went to bed after he checked me in.

I'm going to guess he is ENFJ based on the behavior I saw in two days but don't shoot me if I'm wrong 

The next day he was working in the restaurant of the hostel and we spent time talking with each other. Mind you this is a small little cafe, think like a Starbucks size cafe where the hostel is serving food. He asked me about what I majored in, I told him religious studies, he acted like he hadn't really heard of it before so he wanted me to explain to him more about what religious studies entails. He asked me if I was a practicing Christian -- obviously something important to him as a Christian himself. 

He asked me "So, what did you do today?" He wanted to know every detail about what I had done that day sightseeing, so I told him about the places I went and he asked more questions. 

He is engaging me in all of this conversation while he is working. 

At one point he mentioned that he played guitar and he got up to play two songs in the restaurant -- SWOOOOON! He told me his first and last name, that he had music up on some social media sites, that he had made some CDs in the past. 

At one point I get up and order a hot chocolate and a snack from him. He gives me his instructions for "his favorite way" to enjoy it. After I'm finished he asks "How was it?" My style of flirting is just to be cute and joke around. I say "It was the best one you ever made me." (It was the only one he ever made me) He laughed and smiled hugely at me and said "True!" 

He's leaning forward over the counter of his cafe as we're talking. At one point he grabs a chair at the table where I'm sitting at and sits down to talk to me. While he's working. 

- Mind you, he's not talking to anybody else in the restaurant
- He's not asking anybody else how they enjoyed their meals
- He's not asking other people what they did that day. When is the last time you were at a hotel and the staff came up and asked you to run through a commentary of everything you did that day? Nobody does that. 
- Why would he ask if I was a practicing Christian? Guys ask girls about things that are important to them to see if values align.
- He's talking to me while he is supposed to be working so he's multitasking

I just have always believed deep down that when I met somebody, I would just know, things would just click. And it's hard to describe but with him I just felt this "click", it was an instant thing. 

He was very outgoing, very friendly, the type of person you could tell everybody loves. His coworkers were coming up to him and starting conversations with him, smiling. You can tell he is very friendly and has just a beautiful soul. (One of the things I hate about extroverts -- you feel special around them, but they are friendly with everybody, so can't tell if you are important to them or not). 

About 11 pm I left the restaurant. He saw me getting up and he goes "Are you going to bed?!" I said yes and he smiled and said "Goodnight." 

Unfortunately I only had a couple days in Amsterdam and that was all I got to see him...

But I have his social media that he gave out. And, my understanding is, if somebody gives social media, it is not overstepping any bounds to reach out, correct?

I went on his YouTube (he has videos of him singing and playing music) and made a comment on one of his videos. 
It was of course a very nice comment, reminding him who I was and saying that I thought the video was good.
A few days later I found that he had deleted the video from his YouTube. (??????)
Okay, that hurt my feelings.
Did he delete it because he didn't want my comment seen? Or because he is insecure and decided he hated the video? 
Was he flirting with me back at the hotel? Or was he just being friendly because its the Christian thing to do? 

I sent him a Facebook friend request but it has been two weeks and he has been ignoring it. 

I'm just really perplexed by the whole situation.
This guy is a very sweet kind Christian guy, and I know that he would never intentionally hurt somebody, and honestly I did not think he would do something like delete my comment or ignore me. 
Also we got along so well in person that I thought he would at least reply to my comment. 
Also he gave me his social media so... its not like I'm out here stalking him. He gave me his first and last name. 
I still have access to his Instagram and YouTube and those are public and I can follow him even if he doesn't want to be friends lol.
Ahhhhhh I'm so confused.

column2: Fellow ENFJs, how do you relate to Ti?
column3:
Growing up with my brother, an INTP, my shitty logic was often pointed out to me. Over time, I've come to fixate on whether or not what I'm saying makes sense; in person, that manifests as a refusal to explain myself, knowing I won't be able to organize my thoughts on the spot; online, it manifests as taking ages to write up posts (triple-checking grammar, restructuring sentences to maximize clarity, etc.). I find that my Fe and Ti have an inverse relationship where allowing my Fe to do whatever it wants subtracts from my ability to utilize Ti and focusing on Ti issues inhibits my expression (Fe).

Do you experience Ti similarly? If not, how do you experience it? Have you managed to strike a balance between Fe and Ti?

column2: What do male ENFJS think of female intps?
column3: I'm curious to know how male ENFJS feel about female INTPS?

Hello all,
Being an ENFJ I have of course read many descriptions of ENFJ's online so have a general idea of the picture often portrayed of us. I have reached the conclusion that while I am most definitely an ENFJ indeed and reflect many of the traits, I am rather atypical in that I seem to perhaps be a little more on the thinking side than other ENFJ's. (?) 

I would say I am a stereotypical ENFJ in that I am very idealistic and outgoing, take on leadership roles and care very much about others wellbeing and also how they perceive me etc.

However, I can often be somewhat cold or less like the textbook ENFJ. In certain situations I am far more matter-of-fact than 'sappy'. In an argument, I am often told that I am very quick to see holes in others' arguments and approach things in a very factual or objective way, without necessarily considering feelings - and am capable of "ripping to shreds" points of view that do not seem logical or well-thought out. I don't always make decisions based on feelings and I am easily able to switch off the sappy idealistic side and focus on plain facts and logic. I feel myself being able to "switch off" this side to me and revert to the smiley lovey side when I please - I find it confusing to use both sides at the same time. I suppose I am somewhat mature in some aspects for someone of my age. But I have no real way of being able to tell as I'm still young. Without the intention of bragging, I have always been high-performing in studies, mostly higher than peers with the "smart" types too e.g. INTJ, INTP. My closest friends are thinkers - an INTJ and an ENTP, and I feel that I often relate to them even more than my fellow NF's.  I am not very touchy-feely at all, not much of a romantic and was brought up in a strict household which was not particularly affectionate.

I'm not quite sure of this and would appreciate if those of you well-versed in functions etc or who were older (as I am a little on the young side :wink could help explain why I display certain traits. I very much appreciate any insight anyone could offer to help me understand myself a little more.  (e.g. more developed Ti? Upbringing?)
Thanks!

column2: Why do Fe doms avoid and/or dislike conflict?
column3: Chances are if you are somewhat familiar with cognitive functions that you associate Fe with "social harmony." Basically Fe doms (ENFJs, ESFJs) strive to maintain social harmony by being agreeable, even to a fault. Like seriously the lengths that Fe doms will go through to avoid conflict is amazing. I should know because I have done it and still do it to this day. For the benefit of our none Fe dominant people, can you explain what it is about conflict you don't like and why you avoid conflict?

column2: What are the signs an ENFJ likes you?
column3: INFP here. I like an ENFJ and I can't read her at all...shes always really nice and supportive of me. Flying out to see me, buying me gifts, writing me postcards, etc. She's really great to me. But I can't tell if she has any romantoc feelings for me. What are the signs an ENFJ likes you romantically?

column2: Interaction styles of ENFJ (In-Charge) vs ESFJ (Get-Things-Going)
column3:
According to Linda Berens' Interaction styles Theory, ENFJ are classified as have an In-Charge communication style, which give them a desire to accomplish results, often as quickly as possible through people. They also tend to mobilize groups towards defined goals and have a knack for noticing what's wrong with their environment. 

On the other hand, their sensing counterpart (ESFJ) are put in the Get-Things-Going communication group. While they do possess the same enthousiasm shared by the dominant extroverted feeling function both found in these 2 types, ESFJ are more preoccupied by influencing and involving others in various activities. They are more of a people person than In-Charge types because of their inherent communicative and expressive talents.Types with this interaction style enjoy conversation and try to get as many people involved in the action, hence the name.

Most types paired with In-Charge interaction style are thinking and judgment types (ESTJ/ENTJ/ESTP/ENFJ);
Most types paired with Get-Things-Going interaction style are feeling and perceiving types (ESFJ/ESFP/ENFP/ENTP).

In short, ENFJ tend to naturally go for a leading position, striving for quick and efficient results; ESFJ will try to get everyone involved in an activity, hoping to facilitate its process.

What are your thoughts on this particular topic, and if you identify with ENFJ of ESFJ, do you feel that those behaviours align with your everyday activities and/or mindset?

column2: Help!!!!when an enfj says they aren?ôt sure of their feelings.......
column3:
Okay so first of all, I?ôm a female infp and he?ôs an enfj. We are both freshmen in college majoring in filmmaking. We got close while getting ready for the movie I was directing. And note that there?ôs a lot more I didn?ôt write down cause I couldn?ôt remember the details. 

The first thing I can remember is that I changed my picture of Facebook into a picture when I was on this quiz show in high school. But since then he would come up to me keep talking about that and ask me when I?ôll grow my hair again. And as I said we got close while getting ready for the movie. But before the shoot there was this festival at our school. And I met him coincidentally and he didn?ôt leave my side and so we ended up spending that evening together. But at that time I wasn?ôt sure of my feelings and was in the progress of getting over a former crush so I felt a little uncomfortable so I kept trying to bring a friend between us. While filming, because I was also the main character of my movie, I was bear footed and had only a shirt on though it was very cold. So every time a scene ended he would come up to me and put a coat around me and bring me my shoes. Though he didn?ôt have a coat or shoes on due to him being the camera man. And when I sat alone, he would come and sit next to me. And I had to put a school uniform on for this one scene. But he was like "You look really good with your uniform on." And there was a scene in the ladies 'room. He didn?ôt have to be there because someone else was in charge of the camera at that time. So all the other guys were just resting in the hallway. It was just me and this other girl filming together. But he came up to us and kept watching us film. And whenever I had to go to the shop to buy some supplies for the movie he would come with me. But I tried not to think this through cause I know he?ôs naturally a friendly person who likes to help people out. So, although I was actually interested in him I tried not to acknowledge it cause I might get hurt. And then we came to the last scene of that day. But we had to call a senior because of technology problems. So the atmosphere went a bit down. And because that senior was hurrying everyone I couldn?ôt but to call ok on cuts that clearly was an NG.  So after the shoot ended we were all walking down to my place cause that?ôs where the last scene is shot at. But while the others were walking in front of us we were walking behind them. Then he asked, ?ùIf you don?ôt like the cuts we shot you and I can walk back up and shoot it again. It just takes the two of us anyway.??Although I wanted to say yea I couldn?ôt because I felt so sorry. Anyway the shoot ended successfully and all the other staffs including him and I spent the night at my place.I spent the night at home. And when we were going to the groceries ( because this guy suggested he would cook for us) I was having trouble zipping up my coat. So he (the enfj) came up to me and asked if I would like for him to zip it up for me. But I said it?ôs okay. Anyway while that guy who suggested to cook was cooking all the others were talking in the living room. Then the enfj suddenly points out that he goes to church too. (I?ôm also Christian and my dad is a pastor. I don't quite remember but I think I said that I have to go to church the next day or something like that). While he mentioned that he also said that he started going to church last year cause he likes the songs and people rather than belief itself. Then he said that there?ôs Christian song he really likes and asked me to find it. Then we sort of fell in our own conversations while the others were talking about something else. Then after a while all the others fell asleep and I was talking with him (the endj) while doing my assignment. He was lying on my bed (cause my place is a one room studio). Then he gave me a pillow saying I looked uncomfortable and told me to sit on the bed. So I did. Then he rolls toward me lying right beside my beside our bodies slightly touching and kept watching me do my assignment. The I got all nervous and stiff. But after awhile Ingot tired so he told me to sleep. So he got off the bed telling me that he would just sleep on the floor like the others. But I told him that he didn?ôt have to get off and that he can just sleep on that side of the corner while I?ôll sleep on the other side. (vertically). Then I had to leave that morning but felt sorry to wake everyone up so I just left without waking them up. 
The next day was Monday, so I had to return the equipment I borrowed from the school. But I got a text from him saying that he?ôd go with me. So we went together the next morning then we decided to eat lunch togetherx. But our friend came up to us and asked what we were up to. He asnwered??I?ôm going to eat lunch with her.??So our friend just left like that. But I couldn?ôt wash that morning cause the water didn?ôt come out. So I was in panic and ranting him about not being able to wash. Then he said that he was gonna wash at his friend?ôs place and if I would like to come too. But I didn?ôt feel comfortable going over to his friend?ôs place so I said I?ôll pass. Then he said that I can buy some water bottles at the convinenince store and he?ôll help me wash my hair. But that was sort of embarrassing so I told him that that?ôs a good idea but I?ôll just wash my hair by myself. But I thought he was gonna go over to his friend?ôs place to wash so I said let?ôs meet after 20mintues. But then he went in a teasing way ?ùOh so you want me to go???So I was like ?ùNo no no! That's not what I meant.??So he came over to my place and I washed with the water bottle and then he washed. Then we rested at my place for a but before going out to eat. While I was getting ready I asked him which perfume he liked best from my collections. Then he said ?ùYou pick out what perfume you?ôre going to use every morning? That?ôs sort of cute haha.??So he picked one out for me and we went out. While we were eating he doing his phone. Turns out he was going through my Facebook wall and looking through my photos. He asked me all about the pictures. Then he talked about himself and I talked about myout. Then he took me to the bookstore cause we both like books. And while we were there he kept recommending books, and whenever I got interested in a book he would say that he?ôs read it before and would talk about that book and stuff.  So I bought three books that he recommended. Then we went to this park and walked around talking. And while we were talking he showed me a clip of his favorite movie. Then we just walked around the streets taking pictures. Then he remembered that I hurt my ankle and asked if Inwouod like to go to the clinic. So he went to the clinic with me and then we headed to our school to get to class. He usually sits in the back with his friend but when he saw me sitting in the front he said to his friend ?ùUh..I kind of feel sleepy..Do you want to sit in the front???And he sat next to me. But I fell asleep during class so he kept poking my face and touching my hair. But he does that with all the other girls too. And he?ôs really affectionate toward guys too. He?ôs just a really flirtly and friendly person so I had no idea he was doing that out of interest. He even told me that he likes touching people?ôs hair..So the thought that he was interested in me didn?ôt even cross my mind..Then after class he asked me to eat dinner with him and his friends(which were also my friends as well). So after we ate dinner I brought him and this other friend named A(an info male) over to study. But we ended up chatting lol. The enfj was lying on my bed again with my pillow. But when he saw me trying to lie down he gave me the pillow. And we ended up lyyng down on one pillow looking in each others??eyes. Then he kept touching my haid and head really gently brushing my face and ears really subtlety. So the three of us kept talking like that. A sitting against the wall. We talked about deep things about each other. Anyway then the enfj wabted to watch a movie so I sat beside him on the bed and A fell asleep. And while watching the movie he would tease me by tapping me shoulders and looking away. And the kept brushing my ears and face really subtlety while touching my hair and stuff. Then he leaned against my shoulder. But even at that moment I was thinking oh he must think me as a really close comfortable friend. Anyway then he lied down telling me to lie down too. So we lied down our legs crossed. Then he let out his hand in front of me. But knowing what it meant I was afraid he might think me as a friend and if I held his hand he?ôll think I?ôm a creep I just high fived him several times...The next day at class he was late so I got worried. His roommate asked for me to call him so I called him he didn?ôt pick up. Then he hurriedly came to class looking for a seat. He met eyes with me and acting all awkward he sat next to me. But I hesitated sitting next to him because my feelings had grown the night before and I wasn?ôt sure what to do. Anyway we suddenly went awkward. But because he aaid no I though he was rejecting me.. anyway and then after he asked me why I didn?ôt drink alcohol. I told him why. Then he kept asking me to drink with him. But later I heard from my friend named B who is also very close with enfj, that, that night they met coincidently and he came up to her bragging about the assignment I helped him with. But when B asked if enfj had anything going on with anyone he said no. And B also told me that when she asked him uf he had anyone in mind he said that he didn?ôt have interest in dating.. He would always look at me with a stright face wouldn?ôt meet my eyes s or talk to me to the point where I felt like he was treating me like an invisible person.....But even while he was like that I can feel something going on between us and  I could see him trying to be around me and stuff. So after 2-3months of all these awkward vibes we got a chance tofiom together again and warmed up a little. So he texted me asking if I had time to help a senior he was helping so I said yes. But right after the day I got a text he just suddenly became so excited to see me. Like ge would call out ky name really loudly and say hi to me really enthusiastically. But I got startled by the sudden reaction he gave me so I just waved my hand awkwardly. Then he got all awkward again.. but still be was around me. Then after the senior?ôs movie ended I got sick. But of course he didnt know that. But I was so stressed because of the weird relationship he and i had. That freaking vibe. I didn?ôt want to gk to school. But while sleeping i had a dream of him and I crosspassing each other so i woke up feeling really bad. But rught when j woke up I got a call from him so I picked up the phone. Then he asked me if I was done with my assignment. I said i was. Then he went ??You?ôre so mean..??in a teasing way. SoI was like ?úwhy????And he just kept saying I was mean. Then I asked him if he was done. He said he wasn?ôt. So I said do you want me to help you? And asked where he was. He said he was at the dorm. So scared of rejection( cause everytime I aksed him to do something with me he rejected me) I said ?úoh..then I guess we can?ôt do the assignment together.??And then he got cold again. And he and I decided to go somewhere with a mutual friend. But she couldn?ôt go so he made plans with another friend asking if I want to go. So I said if if doesn?ôt make you uncomfortable. So before the day of our trip him, me,C and D spent the night at my place watching movies. C was a girl. While he lied down next to C he lied down next to me a little more. And whenever he came to lie down next to me he seemed to be hesitating. But when he lied down next to C, although theur heads and shoulders were slightly touching their bodies were?ôt. But when he lied next to me (although I went closer to him too) our whole bodies were touching and our legs were crossing and collapsed. Anyway the next moring C left early and I woke early to wash and then I woke enfj and D up.D is really close with enfj and is a male. But enfj went into my bathroom to wash telling me to send D home to wash because we need to leave for the trip in a few hours. So D left and it was just the two of us. But when it?ôs just the two of us he?ôs really warm. But not as expressive as he used to be before.. He gets uncharacteristicly calm and quiet.. and so things get awkward cause I?ôm like that too. But then we warmed up again and I shared some of my past with him cause the conversation went that way. But at the trip enfj wouldn?ôt leave C?ôs side and kept chattering and teasing her and stuff. And whenever i was close to him he?ôd get all cold and stuff.. I mean there were times where I felt like he was trying to get physically close to me like that one time where our hands brushed. But the momsnt our hands brushed I felt this tingly feeling like we were supposed to hold hands or something like that.. But my isfj friend said she doesn?ôt think he has interest because he?ôs just a really flirtly person.) but anyway infp says because he?ôs so cold when he?ôs with me she thought she was wrong about enfj having interest in me. But this one time infp, enfj, me and this intj had a one on one talk wjth the professor. And while one person was in the professor?ôs office the others had to be waiting in the hall. Enfj was first then infp, then me and the intj was last. But even after enfj was finished he didn?ôt leave saying that he was wating for intj because they were going to thus school event where they give out free dinner. But when I came out without wating more than 5 minutes enfj left with me saying intj was taking too lon and suggested to me and infp if we want to go tothe event too. But infp had to go to a meeting but so did I. So I was panicking over whether i should go with him or the meeting. But he told me to just come with him. So we ate dinner together. But depite that she said he knew alot more about me than she did. And the face and actions he did while waitjng for me felt so caring and was asif he was used to waiting on me. (Not sure what that excactly means though..) And while he was taling about me he could feel that he thinks alot and deeply about me even on regular days. Then my isfj friend suddenly says she was wrong about him not having interest in me. That he tries to hide it but whenever someone talks about me he pays close attention and knows what I?ôm doing and stuff. And isfj also stated that from what she?ôs seen he only pays attention to the things he has great interest in. Anyway after the trip Infelt the vibe getting stronger between us. Like we met eyes more often. He would look at me and we would lock eyes for a few seconds before looking away. But now that I feel that vibe getting steonger I felt more shy so whenever we locked eyes I quickly looked away. And he would sit next to me and I could see his body leaning closer to me but he wouldn?ôt meet my eyes or even talk to me. So at the last day of school he and infp were drinking. And she asked if he has anything going on lately. But he said that he doesn?ôt know anymore. He knows both are are busy, and it?ôs almost summerbreak, and when it?ôs summerbreak he and whoever that girl is (he didn?ôt exaclty say who) lives far away, and he has to go to army(cause in korea every man has to go to the army for 2years) so he doesn?ôt know whether to develop his feelings or not. So after i heard from infp i texted him and am still texting for 3weeks now. And we finally decided to meet up this week. But when texting he?ôs so cold toward when he?ôs really friendly with the others.... So my friend asked if he had anyone he liked a few days ago he said he wasn?ôt sure. And if he responses honestly (cause being an infp I could probably feel if he?ôs not being honest to himself) I?ôll tell him how i feel about him..
So in conclusion what I want to ask is, do you think that ?òsomeone??he?ôs not sure of anymore could be me? And why he suddenly went cold and why he?ôs actung all cold and distant toward me? And do you think the timing of telling him my feelings is right..? Won?ôt he feel uncomfortable about me being too open and honest of my feelings..? PLEASE HELP!!!!!!!!?ò¢?ò¢?ò¢

column2: ENFJ CRUSH! HELP! How do you know if an ENFJ likes you?
column3:
I'm an INFP. I am new to this site so I'm not sure if i'm posting in the correct forum so forgive me if I'm not. Anyway I have a crush on an ENFJ and had a few questions to ask the ENFJs on this site. (I am not close to the ENFJ. I guess you can call us acquaintances)

How do you know if an ENFJ likes you?

How do you know if an ENFJ just does not notice you or is ignoring you? (i have read other comments on how ENFJs will try and hide how they feel and become shy if they have a crush (INFPs do this too). But how do you know if they are being shy because they don't know you well vs being shy because they like you? Is there a difference? OR do ENFJs usually act more confident with someone they like?) we have talked a bit, sometimes one on one and they always get uncomfortable while talking about something they clearly care about. Is that an ENFJ thing? Do all ENFJs get uncomfortable when sharing their feelings? Also do most ENFJs hold back opinions if they disagree? 

We usually only interact in group settings. The ENFJ is always with their best friend, could that effect how they treat others or potentially act around someone they like?

What are signs an ENFJ isn't interested? 
Is there anything I can do to make the ENFJ interested?

I'm an INFP and on top of that I am pretty awkward and shy. Do most ENFJs like shy/awkward people or do they tend to like people more charismatic like themselves?

Thanks for taking your time to read this I know I rambled on and on.

Do you guys have trouble staying present in the moment?

I'm not sure if this is an unhealthy ENFJ thing, or a 4 thing, or if it's just normal. 

Even (or maybe especially) when I have literally nothing going on, a bunch of different thought trains will tend to run through my head. And I have a bad habit of half-doing things, even half-participating in conversations while half of my brain is busy thinking of something else. Usually it IS related to what's going on but, very tangential, and it might be a tangent of a tangent. Like if I talked about it, nobody would have a clue where it came from.

I'm trying really hard to pay deeper attention and be more focused on whatever I'm doing and truly live in the moment. I have a feeling I project my Ni too much onto my Se and that makes me basically an HSP. I get easily overwhelmed by sensory stimulation and trying to notice details and I take them too seriously. I'm kind of like a chihuahua sometimes and my nervous system seems really reactive. Like, if someone sneaks up on me and scares me I have a massive spaz attack.  High-strung is the word, I guess?

I REALLY want to learn to just chill.

column2: How to help my ENFJ boyfriend finding motivation
column3:
Dear ENFJs, I'm an ISTJ and I would really like to have a piece of advice from you: my ENFJ boyfriend asked me to help him find the right motivation to finish the last 6 months of his internship (he?ôs doing a 18 months internship at a law firm) and then the bar exam. 
I am still finishing my law university studies ??so I have not experienced yet the kind of things he has to face on a daily basis at work. He keeps saying that he ?údeeply admires the dutiful way that I schedule my work and time?? and that he thinks that I would/will be ?úso much better than him??in our future jobs, and  that these things naturally make me the best person to give him the right suggestions about what he should do. I tried to tell him that ??considering how different we are in so many ways ??I can try to tell him what I would do, but that I?ôm not sure that what usually works for me would work the same way for him. 
Since he keeps saying that his deepest fear is failing me and disappointing me, I told him that he should probably stop thinking about succeeding in what he does as a way to please me, but should instead think about it as a personal goal, or something that he?ôs doing in order to get where he want to be ??but not for me, for himself. Otherwise, the fear of letting other people down would just add tension to a situation that is already very stressful, and would not benefit him at all. Still, I know this is MY way of dealing with things. He is way more emotive and sensitive than I am, and is easily hurt if he doesn?ôt receive the emotional support he needs. 
So, this is my question: what would you suggest me to do in order to be supportive and help him? I love him more than I can say, and I can't stand the idea of not being able to do something to help him. 
Thank you!

I'm curious as to how all the types perceive themselves in this way, so I'm posting this poll for every type. If you are not an ENFJ, please do vote, but not in this thread! Check back in your type's page shortly if the thread is not yet there. After I've received enough responses, I will post results and thoughts about it in the Myers Briggs page with links to all of these threads so you can check them out in more detail if you wish (probably in a week or two, I will try and mention everyone who responded in case you want to see it so you don't have to check).


______________________________________________________________??
Information for the poll:

First of all, I don't completely like the terms of warm and cold because one definitely has a more positive connotation than the other as far as personality goes, but they are also easy to use for this purpose. Considering that, however, please try not to think of them like that but rater follow the definitions for the purpose of this poll below.  

Warm vs Cold:

This is not so black and white, but try to think which you are most often closer to. You don't have to perfectly match all the words I brainstormed, they are just some both potentially positive and negative words which may be associated more strongly with either type.

Warm ~ expressive, open, emotional, affectionate, enthusiastic, excitable, passionate, ardent, zealous, ebullient, . . . 

Cold ~ rational, reserved, logical, restrained, formal, aloof, composed, calm, cool, tranquil, imperturbable, together, . . .

Outside vs Inside you:

Outside: how people most often would perceive you, particularly on the surface level or if they do not know you well/you are not very comfortable around them

Inside: how you feel about things yourself, whether or to that is projected outwardly, and also possibly how others with whom you are close would most often perceive you 


______________________________________________________________

??For responses, please feel free to elaborate however you please on the subject! Any type is welcome here, please only ENFJs for voting though. Also ask any questions you may have!

If you are inspired to, you can also copy this and highlight where you would place yourself on a scale, roughly between "warm" and "cold." This is more about you as a whole, the inside and out, then one or the other. If you said that you're colder inside and warmer outside, or vice versa, you'll be closer to the middle, for instance. If you said you were warmer both inside and out, you may still want to specify how "warm," and it still may be closer to the middle. Follow your instinct! (I will also try to average the answers for these out by type for the synthesis post.)



colder ???????????????????? warmer??
Thank you!!
